description: This file is a React component for a notes application front-end. It manages listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting notes via API calls. It includes utility functions for API interactions and the main 'Home' React component that renders the UI and handles user interactions.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes or filtered notes based on a search query from the backend API.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Sends a POST request to create a new note.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note by ID via a PUT request.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID via a DELETE request.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a date string into a localized string for display.
